Question: QuVas Technology LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
QuVas Technology LLC

Product: SEAUTO Smart Pool Cleaner Robot at CES 2024

- Featured models: "Roker Plus," "Shark," and "Seal" (new light purple color)
- Mission to connect technology with people in Living Care, Personal Care, and Health Care
- Aims to create extraordinary customer experiences through innovative technology solutions
- Leading technology company based in Irvine, California
- Extensive business expertise in e-commerce, retail, and reselling
- Exceptional product development team crafting cutting-edge hardware and software
- Skilled marketing team adept at promotion strategies for strong visibility
- Commitment to seamlessly blend technology with utility, convenience, and joy
- Contact for more information: marketing@quvasgroup.com
- Website: https://www.quvasgroup.com/

趣瓦斯科技有限责任公司

- 使命是将科技与人们的生活护理、个人护理和健康护理相连
- 通过创新技术解决方案创造非凡的客户体验
- 总部位于加利福尼亚州尔湾的领先技术公司
- 在电子商务、零售和转售方面拥有丰富的业务经验
- 精湛的产品开发团队设计先进的硬件和软件
- 熟练的营销团队擅长宣传策略，提高知名度
